verses.verse: הֲיָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> Knowest עֵ֭ת <WH6256> thou the time לֶ֣דֶת <WH3205> bring forth יַעֲלֵי־ <WH3277> when the wild goats סָ֑לַע <WH5553> of the rock חֹלֵ֖ל <WH2342> do calve אַיָּל֣וֹת <WH355> when the hinds תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> ? [or] canst thou mark

תִּסְפֹּ֣ר <WH5608> Canst thou number יְרָחִ֣ים <WH3391> the months תְּמַלֶּ֑אנָה <WH4390> [that] they fulfil וְ֝יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> ? or knowest עֵ֣ת <WH6256> thou the time לִדְתָּֽנָה׃ <WH3205> when they bring forth
תִּ֭כְרַעְנָה <WH3766> They bow יַלְדֵיהֶ֣ן <WH3206> their young ones תְּפַלַּ֑חְנָה <WH6398> themselves they bring forth חֶבְלֵיהֶ֥ם <WH2256> their sorrows תְּשַׁלַּֽחְנָה׃ <WH7971> they cast out

יַחְלְמ֣וּ <WH2492> are in good liking בְ֭נֵיהֶם <WH1121> Their young ones יִרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> they grow up בַבָּ֑ר <WH1250> with corn יָ֝צְא֗וּ <WH3318> they go forth וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not שָׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> and return לָֽמוֹ׃

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who שִׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> Who hath sent out פֶּ֣רֶא <WH6501> the wild ass חָפְשִׁ֑י <WH2670> free וּמֹסְר֥וֹת <WH4147> the bands עָ֝ר֗וֹד <WH6171> of the swift מִ֣י <WH4310> Who פִתֵּֽחַ׃ <WH6605> loosed
אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to whom שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> I have made עֲרָבָ֣ה <WH6160> the wilderness בֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> Whose house וּֽמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֥יו <WH4908> land his dwellings מְלֵֽחָה׃ <WH4420> and the barren

יִ֭שְׂחַק <WH7832> He scorneth לַהֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> the multitude קִרְיָ֑ה <WH7151> of the city תְּשֻׁא֥וֹת <WH8663> he the crying נ֝וֹגֵ֗שׂ <WH5065> of the driver לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> neither regardeth

יְת֣וּר <WH3491> The range הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> of the mountains מִרְעֵ֑הוּ <WH4829> [is] his pasture וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> after כָּל־ <WH3605> every יָר֣וֹק <WH3387> every green thing יִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH1875> and he searcheth
הֲיֹ֣אבֶה <WH14> be willing רֵּ֣ים <WH7214> Will the unicorn עָבְדֶ֑ךָ <WH5647> to serve אִם־ <WH518> Or יָ֝לִ֗ין <WH3885> thee or abide עַל־ <WH5921> and אֲבוּסֶֽךָ׃ <WH18> crib

הֲ‍ֽתִקְשָׁר־ <WH7194> Canst thou bind רֵ֭ים <WH7214> the unicorn בְּתֶ֣לֶם <WH8525> A furrow עֲבֹת֑וֹ <WH5688> with his band אִם־ <WH518> Or יְשַׂדֵּ֖ד <WH7702> harrow עֲמָקִ֣ים <WH6010> the valleys אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH310> after

הֲֽתִבְטַח־ <WH982> Wilt thou trust בּ֭וֹ כִּי־ <WH3588> because רַ֣ב <WH7227> is great כֹּח֑וֹ <WH3581> him because his strength וְתַעֲזֹ֖ב <WH5800> and leave אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> about יְגִיעֶֽךָ׃ <WH3018> thy labour
הֲתַאֲמִ֣ין <WH539> Wilt thou believe בּ֭וֹ כִּי־ <WH3588> for [יָשׁוּב כ] (יָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> break ק) זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> thy seed וְֽגָרְנְךָ֥ <WH1637> your threshing יֶאֱסֹֽף׃ <WH622> and gather

כְּנַף־ <WH3671> wings רְנָנִ֥ים <WH7443> [Gavest thou] the goodly נֶעֱלָ֑סָה <WH5965> unto the peacocks אִם־ <WH518> lo אֶ֝בְרָ֗ה <WH84> ? or wings חֲסִידָ֥ה <WH2624> and feathers וְנֹצָֽה׃ <WH5133> and plumage
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> Which leaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the earth בֵּצֶ֑יהָ <WH1000> her eggs וְֽעַל־ <WH5921> in עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> them in dust תְּחַמֵּֽם׃ <WH2552> and warmeth

וַ֭תִּשְׁכַּח <WH7911> And forgetteth כִּי־ <WH3588> that רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> that the foot תְּזוּרֶ֑הָ <WH2115> may crush וְחַיַּ֖ת <WH2416> beast הַשָּׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> them or that the wild תְּדוּשֶֽׁהָ׃ <WH1758> may break

הִקְשִׁ֣יחַ <WH7188> She is hardened בָּנֶ֣יהָ <WH1121> against her young ones לְּלֹא־ <WH3808> as though [they were] not לָ֑הּ לְרִ֖יק <WH7385> is in vain יְגִיעָ֣הּ <WH3018> hers her labour בְּלִי־ <WH1097> without פָֽחַד׃ <WH6343> without fear

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because הִשָּׁ֣הּ <WH5382> hath deprived אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> Because God חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> her of wisdom וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not חָ֥לַק <WH2505> neither hath he imparted לָ֝֗הּ בַּבִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> to her understanding
כָּ֭עֵת <WH6256> What time בַּמָּר֣וֹם <WH4791> herself on high תַּמְרִ֑יא <WH4754> she lifteth up תִּֽשְׂחַ֥ק <WH7832> she scorneth לַ֝סּ֗וּס <WH5483> the horse וּלְרֹֽכְבֽוֹ׃ <WH7392> and his rider
הֲתִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Hast thou given לַסּ֣וּס <WH5483> the horse גְּבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> force הֲתַלְבִּ֖ישׁ <WH3847> apparel צַוָּאר֣וֹ <WH6677> his neck רַעְמָֽה׃ <WH7483> thunder
הְֽ֭תַרְעִישֶׁנּוּ <WH7493> Canst thou make him afraid כָּאַרְבֶּ֑ה <WH697> grasshopper ה֖וֹד <WH1935> beauty נַחְר֣וֹ <WH5170> of his nostrils אֵימָֽה׃ <WH367> [is] terrible

יַחְפְּר֣וּ <WH2658> He paweth בָ֭עֵמֶק <WH6010> in the valley וְיָשִׂ֣ישׂ <WH7797> and rejoiceth בְּכֹ֑חַ <WH3581> in [his] strength יֵ֝צֵ֗א <WH3318> he goeth on לִקְרַאת־ <WH7125> to meet נָֽשֶׁק׃ <WH5402> the armed men

יִשְׂחַ֣ק <WH7832> He mocketh לְ֭פַחַד <WH6343> at fear וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵחָ֑ת <WH2865> and is not affrighted וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יָ֝שׁ֗וּב <WH7725> neither turneth he back מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> from חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> the sword
עָ֭לָיו <WH5921> against תִּרְנֶ֣ה <WH7439> rattleth אַשְׁפָּ֑ה <WH827> The quiver לַ֖הַב <WH3851> against him the glittering חֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> spear וְכִידֽוֹן׃ <WH3591> and the shield

בְּרַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> with fierceness וְ֭רֹגֶז <WH7267> and rage יְגַמֶּא־ <WH1572> He swalloweth אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the ground וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יַ֝אֲמִ֗ין <WH539> neither believeth כִּי־ <WH3588> at ק֥וֹל <WH6963> he that [it is] the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> of the trumpet

בְּדֵ֤י <WH1767> among שֹׁפָ֨ר ׀ <WH7782> the trumpets יֹ֘אמַ֤ר <WH559> He saith הֶאָ֗ח <WH1889> Ha וּֽ֭מֵרָחוֹק <WH7350> afar off יָרִ֣יחַ <WH7306> and he smelleth מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> the battle רַ֥עַם <WH7482> the thunder שָׂ֝רִים <WH8269> of the captains וּתְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH8643> and the shouting

הֲ‍ֽ֭מִבִּינָ֣תְךָ <WH998> by thy wisdom יַֽאֲבֶר־ <WH82> fly נֵ֑ץ <WH5322> Doth the hawk יִפְרֹ֖שׂ <WH6566> [and] stretch [כְּנָפֹו כ] (כְּנָפָ֣יו <WH3671> bird ק) לְתֵימָֽן׃ <WH8486> south side אִם־ <WH518> lo עַל־ <WH5921> at
פִּ֭יךָ <WH6310> at thy command יַגְבִּ֣יהַּ <WH1361> mount up נָ֑שֶׁר <WH5404> Doth the eagle וְ֝כִ֗י <WH3588> for יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> on high קִנּֽוֹ׃ <WH7064> her nest

סֶ֣לַע <WH5553> on the rock יִ֭שְׁכֹּן <WH7931> She dwelleth וְיִתְלֹנָ֑ן <WH3885> and abideth עַֽל־ <WH5921> and שֶׁן־ <WH8127> upon the crag סֶ֝֗לַע <WH5553> of the rock וּמְצוּדָֽה׃ <WH4686> and the strong place
מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> there חָֽפַר־ <WH2658> From thence she seeketh אֹ֑כֶל <WH400> the prey לְ֝מֵרָח֗וֹק <WH7350> afar off עֵינָ֥יו <WH5869> [and] her eyes יַבִּֽיטוּ׃ <WH5027> behold

[וְאֶפְרֹחֹו כ] (וְאֶפְרֹחָ֥יו <WH667> young ק) יְעַלְעוּ־ <WH5966> also suck up דָ֑ם <WH1818> blood וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and where חֲ֝לָלִ֗ים <WH2491> and where the slain שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> are there הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> [are] there [is] she פ
